Class CircleMeasureListener

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.project.documents.view.toolListeners.CircleMeasureListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.tools.Listeners.CircleListener, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.tools.Listeners.ToolListener
public class CircleMeasureListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.tools.Listeners.CircleListener

Listener for tools that measure using a circular area, displaying its radius at the status bar of the application's main frame.

Author:
Laura
